General.Name: Graines Voltz S.A
General.Description: Graines Voltz S.A. engages in the distribution of vegetable and flower seeds, seedlings, and bulbs in France and internationally. It also produces nursery plants. It serves professionals, horticulturists, market gardeners, nurseries, and local authorities. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Colmar, France.
